objects.text:

• Perfect Gift for Her
• 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a luxurious and elegant design promoting a rose gold jewelry product. It features a strong diagonal split background with a dual-tone gradient—the left side uses a deep, warm burgundy merging into a pinkish brown, while the right side transitions softly through pastel pinks. Text layers are placed on the burgundy section for high contrast and visual hierarchy. The primary heading (`heading_1` & `heading_2`) uses bold uppercase white typography to convey sophistication. Subheading `subheading` employs a soft rose color for emphasis. Supporting description `description`, price `price`, and tagline `tagline` offer essential product details. A pale pink call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with bold brown text (`cta`) invites interaction. A realistic jewelry image (`product_image`) on the lighter side underscores product focus. Subtle star and circle accents within the background SVG (`background`) enhance the festive and premium vibe.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Burgundy: #5e2c2c
- Warm Rose: #873d3d
- Pale Pink: #f9e0e0
- Accent Pink: #f8c0c0
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a sophisticated and feminine color palette. The main color is a soft rose gold (#F4A7A0), beautifully blended with shimmering crystal white (#F5F5F5) and transparent diamond-like elements (#E1E8EE) to highlight the luxurious design. The soft blush pink (#FAD3DC) of the petal shapes adds a gentle, romantic touch, balancing the brightness of the diamond accents. These colors are skillfully blended—rose gold outlines and connects the white stones, making them pop against the metallic blush. An advertisement banner can effectively use this palette to enhance elegance and femininity while keeping the focus on brilliance.
